trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlReader" /> implementation that reads object graphs and generates a XAML node stream.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlReader" /> 實作，這個實作會讀取圖形並產生 XAML 節點資料流。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> in scenarios where you want to process an object graph, which is typically the object graph of an application that is originally generated from a XAML source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>在您要處理的物件圖形的情況下，通常是原本從 XAML 來源產生的應用程式的物件圖形。

trans-unit.source: You might use the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> where a round trip is made from a XAML start point to a XAML end point.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會使用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>其中反覆存取由從 XAML 起點到 XAML 結束點。

trans-unit.source: Or you might run a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> over the object graph; process the intermediate XAML node stream, if it is required, by using APIs on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>; and then use <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter> to serialize XAML nodes to XML.
trans-unit.target: 或者您可能會執行<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>透過物件圖形; 處理中繼 XAML 節點資料流，如果需要，在使用 Api<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>和<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>;，然後使用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>序列化為 XML 的 XAML 節點。

trans-unit.source: More advanced scenarios might supply a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter> override and a specific XAML schema context that the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> uses and then passes to the writer override.
trans-unit.target: 更進階的案例可能會提供<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>覆寫和特定 XAML 結構描述內容，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>使用，然後將傳遞至寫入器覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Typical scenarios for using <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> call the members that <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> implements; they also call <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Close%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>, and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> from the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader> base class.
trans-unit.target: 使用的典型案例<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>呼叫成員<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>實作，它們也呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Close%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>，和<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A>從<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The root of the object tree / object graph to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取之物件樹狀結構/物件圖形的根。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If initialized with this constructor, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> object has the initial settings of a default <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings> object and the initial context of a default <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個建構函式，初始化<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>物件都有預設值的初始設定<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>物件和預設值的初始內容<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>。

trans-unit.source: The root of the object tree to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取之物件樹狀結構的根物件。

trans-unit.source: A settings object.
trans-unit.target: 設定物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> class with the specified reader settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的讀取器設定，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The settings object specifies rules for reader operations, such as line number processing, error handling behavior, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 設定物件，指定讀取器作業，例如行數字處理、 錯誤處理行為，以及其他規則。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>。

trans-unit.source: If initialized with this constructor, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> object has the initial context of a default <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個建構函式，初始化<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>物件都有預設值的初始內容<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>。

trans-unit.source: The root of the object tree to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取之物件樹狀結構的根物件。

trans-unit.source: The schema context for the reader to use.
trans-unit.target: 供讀取器使用的結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> class with the specified schema context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的結構描述內容，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If initialized with this constructor, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> object has the initial settings of a default <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個建構函式，初始化<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>物件都有預設值的初始設定<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="schemaContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="schemaContext" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The root of the object tree to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取之物件樹狀結構的根物件。

trans-unit.source: The schema context for the reader to use.
trans-unit.target: 供讀取器使用的結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: A settings object.
trans-unit.target: 設定物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> class with the specified schema context and reader settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的結構描述內容和讀取器設定，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The settings object specifies rules for reader operations, such as line number processing and error handling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 設定物件，指定讀取器作業，例如行數字處理與錯誤處理行為的規則。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="schemaContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="schemaContext" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object instance that is available at the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前讀取器位置上可用的物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object instance at the current reader position; or <see langword="null" /> if the reader position is not on an object.
trans-unit.target: 目前讀取器位置上的物件執行個體，如果讀取器位置不在物件上，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that reports whether the reader position is at the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會報告讀取器是否位於檔案結尾。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reader position is at the end of the file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位置在檔案的結尾則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> at the reader position, if the reader position is on a <see cref="F:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.StartMember" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位置在 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> 上，則取得讀取器位置上的目前 <see cref="F:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.StartMember" />。

trans-unit.source: The current member; or <see langword="null" /> if the reader position is not on a member.
trans-unit.target: 目前的成員，如果讀取器位置不在成員上，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XAML namespace declaration from the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的讀取器位置取得 XAML 命名空間宣告。

trans-unit.source: The XAML namespace declaration if the reader is positioned on a <see cref="F:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.NamespaceDeclaration" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位於 <see cref="F:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.NamespaceDeclaration" /> 上，則為 XAML 命名空間宣告，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a non-null result only if the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> property of the current reader position is <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.NamespaceDeclaration>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回非 null 的結果才<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>屬性目前的讀取器位置是<xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.NamespaceDeclaration>。

trans-unit.source: It does not infer a namespace that is based on the context of other node types, such as an object in that namespace.
trans-unit.target: 它不會推斷為基礎的其他節點型別，例如該命名空間中的物件內容的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 目前節點的型別。

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> APIs, you typically check the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> property after every operation that potentially advances the reader position, such as the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>Api，您通常檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>屬性可能的位置往前移讀取器，例如每個作業之後<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Read%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> indicates the information that you can obtain from the current reader position and the methods that you call next.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> 表示您可以從目前讀取器的位置和您在下一個呼叫的方法取得的資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might access the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A> properties; or you might call the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> method if you are not interested in the contents of the current node type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能需要存取<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A>屬性; 或者您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A>方法，如果您不想要在目前的節點類型的內容。

trans-unit.source: Provides the next XAML node from the source object graph, if a node is available.
trans-unit.target: 從來源物件圖形中提供下一個 XAML 節點 (如果有節點的話)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a node is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有節點則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: After you call the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Read%2A> method and obtain a `true` result, you typically access the node properties.
trans-unit.target: 在您呼叫後<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Read%2A>方法並取得`true`結果，您通常可以存取的節點屬性。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> property, you can access the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 取決於<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>屬性，您可以存取<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides schema information for the information set.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，這個物件會為資訊集提供結構描述資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides schema information for the information set.
trans-unit.target: 物件，會為資訊集提供結構描述資訊。

trans-unit.source: The schema context is a conceptual intermediary between a schema in the conventional sense, and the handling of XAML schema concepts by particular XAML processors (parsing, reading, and writing operations).
trans-unit.target: 結構描述內容是傳統的意義而言，結構描述之間的 XAML 結構描述的概念 （剖析、 讀取和寫入作業） 的特定 XAML 處理器所處理的概念媒介。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> of the object at the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前讀取器位置上之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> of the object at the current reader position; or <see langword="null" /> if the position is not on an object.
trans-unit.target: 目前讀取器位置上之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />，如果位置不在物件上，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a non-null result only if the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> property of the current reader position is <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.StartObject>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回非 null 的結果才<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>屬性目前的讀取器位置是<xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.StartObject>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the node at the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前讀取器位置上之節點的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current node; or <see langword="null" />, if the reader position is not on a <see cref="F:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.Value" /> node type.
trans-unit.target: 目前節點的值，如果讀取器位置不在 <see cref="F:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType.Value" /> 節點型別上，則為 <see langword="null" />。
